summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6144 for the improvement of 46th Avenue Southwest from West Hinds Street to West Stevens Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85536 and leving and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
